name: The Fool
uprightMeaning: Fresh starts, optimism, and trust in the unfolding path.
reversedMeaning: Hesitation, fear of change, or reckless leaps.
description: The Fool steps toward the unknown with an open heart, reminding you to view life with curiosity while staying aware of the edge.

name: The Magician
uprightMeaning: Manifestation through skill, focus, and aligned will.
reversedMeaning: Scattered energy, manipulation, or untapped talents.
description: Tools of every suit rest on the Magician's table, urging you to direct your talents toward a single, inspired action.

name: The High Priestess
uprightMeaning: Intuition, sacred knowledge, and inner stillness.
reversedMeaning: Secrets kept, intuition ignored, or inner dissonance.
description: Veiled between pillars, the High Priestess invites you to trust the quiet whisper within and honor what is unseen.

name: The Empress
uprightMeaning: Nurturing abundance, creativity, and embodied joy.
description: Surrounded by lush fields, the Empress teaches you to tend both your creations and yourself with gentle care.

name: The Emperor
reversedMeaning: Rigidity, control issues, or shaky foundations.
description: The Emperor's throne is carved from stone, a reminder that wise boundaries and strategy support lasting growth.

name: The Lovers
uprightMeaning: Aligned partnerships, values, and heartfelt choices.
description: The Lovers represent a sacred mirror, asking whether your decisions arise from love and shared values.
